contactForm.error: There was a problem getting your message through. Please try another way - sorry about that!
contactForm.success: We've sent your message using unionised internet courier tubes. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
cookies.message: We use cookies to make this website work, and will never use them to track you.
iwgb: Independent Workers Union of Great Britain
notFound: Sorry, but we weren't able to find the page you were looking for, so we've taken you back to our homepage.
